snippet: Stephen Curry, the guard being groomed by Coach Mark Jackson, who starred on his high school team in Brooklyn, scored 21 points in the second half to lift the Warriors over the Nets.
abstract: Golden State Warriors defeat Brooklyn Nets, 109-102.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry, the guard being groomed by Coach Mark Jackson, who starred on his high school team in Brooklyn, scored 21 points in the second half to lift the Warriors over the Nets.

headline.seo: Point Guards Past and Present Send Nets to Third Straight Loss
headline.main: Point Guards Past and Present Send Nets to Third Straight Loss
headline.print_headline: Point Guards Past and Present Send Nets to Third Straight Loss
